custombutton.name: Preference Switcher (Basic)
custombutton.help:
ð—¨ð˜€ð—®ð—´ð—² âš« Edit this button Initialization tab to change its preferences. âš« The ð—½ð—¿ð—²ð—³ð—¡ð—®ð—ºð—² variable is the full name of the preference that you want to control with this button. âš« The ð˜€ð˜„ð—¶ð˜ð—°ð—µð—•ð˜‚ð˜ð˜ð—¼ð—»ð—œð—ºð—®ð—´ð—² variable set to true will allow you to change this button image depending on the preference current value. âš« The ð—¯ð—¼ð—¼ð—¹ð—˜ð—»ð—®ð—¯ð—¹ð—²ð—±ð—œð—ºð—®ð—´ð—² and ð—¯ð—¼ð—¼ð—¹ð——ð—¶ð˜€ð—®ð—¯ð—¹ð—²ð—±ð—œð—ºð—®ð—´ð—² variables are the images used by ð—¯ð—¼ð—¼ð—¹ð—²ð—®ð—» preferences. âš« The ð—½ð—¿ð—²ð—³ð—©ð—®ð—¹ð˜‚ð—²ð˜€ variable is an array of values for ð—¶ð—»ð˜ð—²ð—´ð—²ð—¿ and/or ð˜€ð˜ð—¿ð—¶ð—»ð—´ preferences. It has to have at least 2 values. Every time this button is clicked, the preference will switch its value between the values defined here. âš« The ð—½ð—¿ð—²ð—³ð—œð—ºð—®ð—´ð—²ð˜€ variable is an array of links to images for ð—¶ð—»ð˜ð—²ð—´ð—²ð—¿ and/or ð˜€ð˜ð—¿ð—¶ð—»ð—´ preferences. The first image in this variable correspond to the first value in the ð—½ð—¿ð—²ð—³ð—©ð—®ð—¹ð˜‚ð—²ð˜€ variable. The second image, to the second value in the ð—½ð—¿ð—²ð—³ð—©ð—®ð—¹ð˜‚ð—²ð˜€ variable, and so forth.
ð—œð—ºð—½ð—¼ð—¿ð˜ð—®ð—»ð˜ ð—»ð—¼ð˜ð—²ð˜€ âš« This button can be cloned/installed countless times to control/switch any preference of any type. âš« If the preference you wish to control/switch doesn't exists, you will be asked to create it on the fly.
